sentences.en: A clearly defined track now leads down to the valley.
sentences.cn: 眼前有一条清晰可辨的小径通向山谷。

sentences.en: A milky mist filled the valley.
sentences.cn: 白蒙蒙的薄雾弥漫山谷。

sentences.en: A slight wind rippled the crops in the valley.
sentences.cn: 一阵微风吹过，山谷里的庄稼便随风起伏。

sentences.en: a small town set in a valley
A whole valley of boulders tossed higgledy-piggledy as though by some giant.
sentences.cn: 整个山谷里巨石翻滚，就像有巨人在狂扔乱掷。

sentences.en: I set off for the valley, trusting to luck.
sentences.cn: 我动身去山谷了，一切全凭运气。

sentences.en: I'll take you back down to the valley.
sentences.cn: 我会带你返回下面的山谷里。

sentences.en: Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
sentences.cn: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

sentences.en: The hills above the valley are bare rock.
sentences.cn: 山谷上方的小山全是光秃秃的石头。

sentences.en: The horses thundered across the valley floor.
sentences.cn: 马群轰隆隆地从谷底奔跑而过。

sentences.en: The truck was trundling along the escarpment of the Zambesi valley.
sentences.cn: 卡车沿着赞比西山谷的绝壁缓缓行进。

sentences.en: The wind sighed through the valley.
These Severn Valley woods have been exploited for timber since Saxon times.
sentences.cn: 从撒克逊时代起就开始采伐塞文山谷的这些树林获取木料。

sentences.en: Tourists can visit outlying areas like the Napa Valley Wine Country.
sentences.cn: 游客可以前往像纳帕谷酒乡这样远离城市喧嚣的地方游览。

sentences.en: We drove up a steep-sided valley.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着陡峭的峡谷向上开。
